channel.title: Bandwidth Limit Exceeded Message
channel.description:
Sorry about that guys. Everything's fine now. When I originally ordered the server Black Mesa is hosted on it had limited BW so I set a BW limit for the Black Mesa website to make sure we didn't go over. Yesterday I just ordered unmetered bandwidth on the server and we are now on that plan so I have removed the limit. Now I don't have to worry about it going over :smiley:
[b]Update:[/b] For anyone who wants to see how much traffic BM uses, here's a nifty graph :stuck_out_tongue: [img]https://files.ryanmaffit.com/SS-2009.11.17-16.23.16.png[/img] That decrease was probably around when the BM site got "deactivated" and that huge increase was when I put it back :stuck_out_tongue:
Sorry again, Ryan Maffit

item.title: Bandwidth Limit Exceeded Message
item.dc:creator: Collision
item.description:
(AEF) Collision.QP?: wtf
(AEF) Collision.QP?: why the hell the did the traffic jump
(AEF) Collision.QP?: wait
(AEF) Collision.QP?: it went up the exact same time viv posted her pink thread
(AEF) Collision.QP?: hmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm
(AEF) Collision.QP?: coincidence?
[BMV] Chief Officer. DenDrio: I THINK NOT

I think I’m onto something.

Read full topic

item.title: Bandwidth Limit Exceeded Message
item.dc:creator: Cameron_D
item.description:
At first when I saw the message I just loled, then one of my friends said that google was stuffing up for him so I was like ‘Black Mesa is released! Queue the beginning of the end of the Internet!’ But it wasn’t released.

pfannkuchen_gesicht:

my page had 1GB traffic per day and 10GB is the limit per month

I have 7tb per month :3

Read full topic

item.title: Bandwidth Limit Exceeded Message
item.dc:creator: HyperCorruption
item.description:
The thought the mod had been released did pop into my mind, but then I did some thinking and knew it wasn’t true.

Read full topic

item.title: Bandwidth Limit Exceeded Message
item.dc:creator: Ford_Prefect
item.description:
rm249:

…I’m not in the mood to pay $0.25/GB overcharge fees

What do you mean overcha[COLOR=‘Red’]B[COLOR=‘DarkRed’]O[COLOR=‘Red’]O[COLOR=‘DarkRed’]M[COLOR=‘Red’]!

Read full topic

item.title: Bandwidth Limit Exceeded Message
item.dc:creator: rm249
item.description:
Sitten_duck:

Lol I think you gave alot of naive people a heart attack today thinking the mod was out or something…

So, moving to unmetered bandwidth… expecting lots of traffic before too long?
[COLOR=’#212121’]totally joking btw

Nothing in particular, there has just been a LOT more traffic lately and I’m not in the mood to pay $0.25/GB overcharge fees (The server had a 1.5TB limit, as of today it’s used 1.1TB, so it was coming close)

Read full topic

item.title: Bandwidth Limit Exceeded Message
item.dc:creator: HomemadeMuffins
item.description:
Oh good, we’re back on.

I was sad panda there for a bit.

Read full topic

item.title: Bandwidth Limit Exceeded Message
item.dc:creator: Dillxn
item.description:
Someonerandm:

If the mod gets released Thrusday I’d have to choose between it and L4D2, and that would tear me apart.

How is that of any contest?

Anyway, my first thought (before I used my brain…) was that it might have been released. After that half-a-second had passed I went on ModDB to satisfy my BM withdrawal.

Read full topic

item.title: Bandwidth Limit Exceeded Message
item.dc:creator: PharCry
item.description:
daventry:

Man you gave me a heart attack, i thought this was a Website Update saying the Mod has been released and People are Downloading like crazy.

When the mod comes out, I am pretty sure they are gonna have it hosted on other servers or something because otherwise it would lag this one out… enough where it might (likely) crash.

Read full topic
